jobTitle: Middle School Teachers for Seasonal Tutoring
jobDescription: Do you like working with late elementary and middle school students? Inspirica, the premier provider of in-home tutoring for standardized tests, seeks highly qualified individuals for seasonal one-on-one tutoring positions focusing on working students in grades 4 through 8 as they prepare for the SSAT and ISEE from August through December.What do we ask? A student load of at least 5 students (including some weekend availability)What can you expect? Generous compensation; In-depth, paid training; Customized material, programs, marketing and all administrative functions so that our tutors can concentrate solely on teachingWhat qualifications must you have? A Bachelor's degree and a record of academic success.Please submit a brief cover letter and resume detailing your academic history and any relevant experience.For over 30 years Inspirica has been hiring tutors who are dynamic, engaging, and able to connect with, motivate and inspire today's student. Join us today!
